Dear {{lead.First Name}},
Thank you very much for your faithful support!
I really hope that you enjoyed the first dinners of the Season of Gastronomy with me, and I am pleased to present you in avant premiere the list of beautiful upcoming dinners for the month of November.
I am looking forward to meeting you at our next memorable gastronomy experiences!
With Warm Regards,
Marie
